snippet: In addition to lending books from small presses or by little-known writers, the Mellow Pages Library in Bushwick, Brooklyn, is a reading room and gathering spot.
abstract: Mellow Pages Library in Brooklyn is meant to serve as a reading room and gathering spot in addition to being a lending library; offers coffee and inventory of 1,300 books, many of them from obscure presses or by little-known writers.
lead_paragraph: In addition to lending books from small presses or by little-known writers, the Mellow Pages Library in Bushwick, Brooklyn, is a reading room and gathering spot.

headline.seo: At a Do-It-Yourself Salon in Brooklyn, Books Obscure and Arcane
headline.main: At a Library in Brooklyn, Rare Books and Coffee
headline.print_headline: At a Library In Brooklyn, Rare Books And Coffee
